price: 53. Mpe bakabwani(1) na makambo ya lingomba lia bango biteni biteni moto na moto azali kosepela na o ya ye.
arabic: فَتَقَطَّعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُم بَيۡنَهُمۡ زُبُرٗاۖ كُلُّ حِزۡبِۭ بِمَا لَدَيۡهِمۡ فَرِحُونَ
footnotes: 1 Bakabwani: Ezalaki: Baye bazalaki kolanda batindami.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: fataqaṭṭaʿū amrahum baynahum zuburan kullu ḥiz'bin bimā ladayhim fariḥūna
